mapper.sql: select id, assignment_id, question_id, score, sequence, is_deleted, delete_time, create_time, update_time from assignment_question
mapper.insert:
insert into assignment_question
assignment_id, question_id, score, sequence, is_deleted, create_time, update_time,
#{assignmentId}, #{questionId}, #{score}, #{sequence}, #{isDeleted}, #{createTime}, #{updateTime},
mapper.update:
update assignment_question
assignment_id = #{assignmentId}, question_id = #{questionId}, score = #{score}, sequence = #{sequence}, is_deleted = #{isDeleted}, delete_time = #{deleteTime}, update_time = #{updateTime},
where id = #{id} and is_deleted = 0
mapper.delete: update assignment_question set is_deleted = 1, delete_time = now(), update_time = now() where id = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT aq.assignment_id AS assignment_id, aq.sequence AS question_sequence, GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT kp.id SEPARATOR ',') AS kp_ids, GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT kp.title SEPARATOR ',') AS kp_titles FROM assignment_question aq LEFT JOIN question q ON aq.question_id = q.id AND q.is_deleted = 0 LEFT JOIN knowledge_point kp ON TRIM(LOWER(kp.title)) = TRIM(LOWER(q.knowledge_point)) AND kp.is_deleted = 0 WHERE aq.assignment_id = #{assignmentId} AND q.course_id = #{courseId} AND aq.is_deleted = 0 AND q.knowledge_point IS NOT NULL GROUP BY aq.assignment_id, aq.sequence ORDER BY aq.sequence ASC

SELECT aq.question_id AS questionId, aq.assignment_id AS assignmentId, a.title AS assignmentName, aq.question_sequence AS questionSequence, GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT ak.kp_id SEPARATOR ',') AS kpIds, #{studentId} AS studentUserId FROM assignment_question aq LEFT JOIN assignment a ON aq.assignment_id = a.id LEFT JOIN assignment_kp ak ON aq.assignment_id = ak.assignment_id LEFT JOIN student_answer sa ON aq.question_id = sa.question_id AND sa.student_user_id = #{studentId} AND sa.is_correct = 0 WHERE sa.question_id IS NOT NULL GROUP BY aq.question_id, aq.assignment_id, a.title, aq.question_sequence ORDER BY aq.assignment_id, aq.question_sequence;
